website_summaries.verdict: The Edge Luxe from Adidas just like its latest version, the Edge Luxe 3 is a neutral running shoe that’s great for daily running activities and casual purposes. Its appealing aesthetics catch attention, yet its functionality is its main attraction. It’s durable and dependable when it comes to performance. It’s a shoe designed specifically for women, and it’s efficient for any activity.
pros: The upper unit uses lightweight synthetic materials in order to provide a comfortable and breathable coverage
Runners generally appreciated the sock-like construction of the upper, keeping them free from skin irritation or discomfort
A good number of welcomed noted its affordable price, in light of its high quality construction and design
The color & design options became popular among a lot of runners
Wide and skinny laces are added to provide style and form to the upper unit
Energy-fueled running sessions are powered by the BOUNCE™ mid-sole, a comfortable and responsive foam unit
Durable rubber fills the outsole unit
cons: A few runners felt that the collar and tongue needed additional padding to add more cushioning to the dimensions of the foot when running

customer_reviews.title: Love the shoe, too bad it’s been worn by someone else
customer_reviews.text: I’d love these shoes if it weren’t for the fact they were clearly worn by someone else first. By worn, I mean there is a spot on the side and scuffs/dirt on the bottom. If you pay $85 for “new” shoes, you expect them to be new.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Grabert

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. Are true to size. They look super cute! They laces are different but are nice to leave tied and slip on the shoe. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are just as stunning in person as they are online! I am a bit obsessed with the color yellow and find it hard to find super cute yellow shoes but Adidas did it this time! They are so gorgeous! I will say that they are a little tight getting on and around the middle due to the tongue attachments to the inside base of the shoe but It’s really not that bad. I’m very happy I found there.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: Giving 1 star because 0 wasn't an option. I bought these on Aug. 17th for my daughter. She has worn them 3 times since and they are already falling apart. The seam that has the logo has completely separated on both sides. Very disappointing. Feels like I need a refund but apparently the window to return was 30 days after purchase.
customer_reviews.author: klsm

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable with great support
customer_reviews.text: So comfy. Great support. I taught a cardio kickboxing class in them right out of the box. I love them
customer_reviews.author: smart shopper

customer_reviews.title: Don't care for the elastic tongue attachment
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very cute and fit well once you get them on. The elastic tongue attachments made them almost impossible to get on. Return was easy.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Make sure the fabric on the sides are fastened down.
customer_reviews.text: I returned these shoes because the fabric on the sides were not fastened down like they were supposed to be. When I received the second pair; they were not tacked down either. I liked the shoes but I had to glue them together in order to wear them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Some stains when arrived
customer_reviews.text: Product is greag and fits great, but it looks like someone else has worn them. There is a stain on shoe laces and sole
customer_reviews.author: M. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Coming apart my first day wearing
customer_reviews.text: Oh no my first day wearing these and they are coming apart! They are very comfortable but they are coming apart!
customer_reviews.author: jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Terrible shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Only giving two stars cause they're cute with every outfit, but these HURT SO BAD! These were not made for wearing more than a couple hours at a time. I wanted to cut my feet off after wearing them to work. I thought it was just me but I switched back to my old pair of nikes and it was like heaven. The tongue is attached at the sides which is also another big problem seeing as it runs the sides of your feet. Just, don't buy these.
customer_reviews.author: Kacey

customer_reviews.title: Blisters.
customer_reviews.text: Have had these exactly a month. I run literally everyday and in one month they’ve already rubbed holes inside the heal of the fabric and I’m all of a sudden getting bad blisters.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: uncomfortable to wear
customer_reviews.text: These shoes left my heels all calloused and wounded just by wearing them for walking. I only walked 15 minutes and it became very uncomfortable to wear. I want to like these shoes so badly since it’s so pretty; but truthfully, my heels can’t stand them.
customer_reviews.author: faith

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like these shoes, and I did to start! They looked nice, they gave great support for weightlifting and cardio. The first pair came ripped, where the other customers are showing in pictures. I exchanged for a new pair, and after two workouts, the mesh ripped AGAIN. Horrible quality which makes me really sad.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap knockoff suspected
customer_reviews.text: Shoe started peeling on the side after 1 week of use and did not come in an original adidas box. I suspect this is a cheap Chinese knockoff
customer_reviews.author: Cara K. Ramelow

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected... thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: I have a pair of the same only older...very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MELEE1111

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable everyday sneaker
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes for an internship where I knew I would be on my feet all day. They offer a ton of support and are well cushioned. I am a true 8.5 and ordered that size. They fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Hero M.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable sneakers
customer_reviews.text: I love the adidas Edge Lux style. I wear them all day at work. They’re light and comfortable! They fit true to size!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I get a lot of compliments on these shoes. Hopefully they hold up as good as they look.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Im inlove they are so nice & comfy fit!!
customer_reviews.text: This shoe fits so perfect & I am obsessed with them! They are so comfy & so nice! Better than i expected. Such quality. Looks good with anything i wear. The fit is perfect & snug. I would highly recommend these shoes to anyone!!
customer_reviews.author: Chrycinda

customer_reviews.title: No regrets
customer_reviews.text: The grey is actually more lavender but these fit like a glove and are so comfy
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Right at first then fits right
customer_reviews.text: As all new tennis shoes when you first wear them they are a little tight but once worn in a few days to a week it fits just right
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: 1 star
customer_reviews.text: Received these shoes today with what looks like a blood stain on the right shoe. So disappointed in this purchase. The shoes are so cute but now I’m a little concerned on what this stain is and how it got there.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia P

customer_reviews.title: Runs half a size small
customer_reviews.text: These run half a size small. I have an old pair of Edge Lux from a few years ago, which are size 10 and a little loose so I ordered these in size 9.5. They fit more like a 9, so I had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: CH

customer_reviews.title: Extremely hard sole!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely hard sole. My gut tells me they are knock offs! My edge lux 3 were so comfortable and these are walking in cardboard.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute everyday sneaker
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. They are definitely narrow though. I get a lot of compliments on them and they go with everything.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Furlough

customer_reviews.title: Solid,
customer_reviews.text: Ended up returning for a different model but these were great too.
customer_reviews.author: acaciabee

customer_reviews.title: Someone else wore them
customer_reviews.text: The quality isn’t great. Looks like someone else wore them.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Murray

customer_reviews.title: Lite weight, runs true to size.
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! Extremely comfortable with plenty of room for toes!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Way too narrow
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these shoes (black with pink) and arrived within 4 days, not too bad. The shoes look very nice but were way too narrow. I couldn’t even slide my foot in the shoes without a shoe horn. I don’t have wide feet. These shoes were much too tight. The length was fine.
customer_reviews.author: Nora Rositas

product_meta.title: adidas mens Edge Lux 4
feature_bullets: adidas female running shoe; the adidas brand has a long history and deep-rooted Connection with sport. Everything we do is rooted in sport; Driven by a relentless pursuit of innovation as well as decades of accumulating sports science expertise, we cater for all, from elite professional athletes and teams to any individual who wants to make sport part of their lives
